definition: the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
to move/to transport/to use/to apply/fortune/luck/fate
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
the Grand Canal, 1800 km from Beijing to Hangzhou, built starting from 486 BC

sentences.english: The Grand Canal joins the Haihe at Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 大运河在天津与海河汇合。

sentences.english: The painting depicts the Grand Canal, Venice, looking north from the Rialto Bridge.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画描绘的是从里亚托桥向北望的威尼斯大运河。

sentences.english: The canal connects Beijing with Hangzhou, 800 miles to the south.
sentences.chinese: 大运河连接北京和南方的杭州，两地相距800英里。

sentences.english: The Beidaihe inland water transportation is extremely developed, it is interlinked with the Beijing-Hangzhou Canal.
sentences.chinese: 北戴河内河运输十分发达，与京杭大运河相通。

sentences.english: The Grand Canal of China enters Shandong from the northwest and leaves on the southwest.
sentences.chinese: 京杭大运河自西北向西南流经山东省。

sentences.english: Wuzhen, , an ancient water town in Zhejiang, lies at the riverside of Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal.
sentences.chinese: 乌镇是浙江的一座古老的水镇，坐落在京杭大运河畔。

sentences.english: Located on the riverside of the Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal, Wuzhen of Zhejiang Province is an ancient water town.
sentences.chinese: 乌镇是浙江的一座古老水镇，坐落在京杭大运河河畔。

sentences.english: Besides the old Jing-Hang Grand Canal and the Jing-Hu Railway pass through here.
sentences.chinese: 另外，古老的京杭大运河和京沪铁路也途经这里。

sentences.english: The Grand Canal of China cuts through Jiangsu from north to south, traversing all the east-west river systems.
sentences.chinese: 大运河从南到北横跨江苏全省，穿越东西所有水系。

sentences.english: Yangzhou is a little charming city on the Grand Canal.
sentences.chinese: 扬州是大运河边上一个妩媚华丽的小城。

sentences.english: It attracts the travelers for the Grand Canal and other historic sites.
sentences.chinese: 它以大运河和其他一些古迹吸引着旅游者。

sentences.english: Tianjin region began as the formation of the sui dynasty waterway.
sentences.chinese: 天津地区的形成始于隋朝大运河的开通。

sentences.english: Botou ancient Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal is a major commercial port, business and trade industry is developed.
sentences.chinese: 泊头自古就是京杭大运河畔一大商埠，商贸业发达。

sentences.english: Venice's Grand Canal as seen from the Academy Bridge, with the domes of Santa Maria della Salute in the background.
sentences.chinese: 这是在一座桥上拍摄的威尼斯大运河。

sentences.english: Gondolas and motorboats took part in the event along Venice's Grand Canal.
sentences.chinese: 平底船和汽艇参加了在威尼斯大运河沿岸举办的活动。

sentences.english: Renowned at home and abroad of the Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal and had to wear Scenic Area.
sentences.chinese: 驰名中外的京杭大运河穿风景区而过。
